title: Average price for properties for sale in Rome , Italy 2019 , by area
yAxis: Price in euros per square meter
summary: This is a bar chart representing Area in the x axis and Price in euros per square meter in the y axis.
The Price in euros per square meter is highest at Area Centro Storico and lowest at Area Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi.
The Price in euros per square meter of Area Gregorio VII Baldo degli Ubaldi is 1.97% smaller than the maximum value at Centro Storico.
